rewardDis: is not a sponsor of the rewards or otherwise affiliated with Opinionetwork. The logos and other identifying marks attached are trademarks of and owned by each represented company and/or its affiliates.  Please visit each company's website for additional terms and conditions.
rewardNote: Note: If you do not receive an email confirmation of your redemption or see your redemption in the history below in the next 2 hours, please contact our support department for assistance.
rewardNote1: Note : Within the next 2 hours, you will see your redemption in your history below.  If you do not, please contact (support@opinionetwork.com)
paypalrequest1: Requests made on the 1st - 15th of the month (EST) will be paid on the 16th.
paypalrequest2: Requests made on the 16th - 31st of the month (EST) will be paid on the 1st.
paypalrequest3: When the 1st or 16th fall on weekends and holidays, payments are processed on the first business day immediately following.
paypalrequest4: PayPal rewards are deposited using the email address you use to access your OpinionBar.com account.
paypalrequest5: If your email is not associated with your PayPal account, please add it to assure the deposit will go through. You can link multiple email addresses to each PayPal account.
